unit.utterance: Yek āqāyi bud az bālāye deraxt golābi mičid
unit.utterance_translation: There was a man on a tree picking pears

unit.utterance: golābihā rā ke čid āvard pāyin do tā sabad bud
unit.utterance_translation: having picked the pears, he brought them down, there were two baskets

unit.utterance: bad miravad bālā dobāre bečinad yeki az bačeha bā dočarxe az ān taraf miāyad yeki az sabadhā rā boland mikonad va mibarad
unit.utterance_translation: he climbs up to continue picking, a boy on a bike comes over and takes away one of the baskets

unit.utterance: dočarxeyi az kenāraš rad mišavad bexātere bādi ke dārad kolāhaš mioftad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: another bike passes him by, a wind rises and blows the hat off his head

unit.utterance: havāsaš be kolāhaš miravad jeloye dočarxe sang mioftad mixorad bad mioftad zamin
unit.utterance_translation: he got distracted by his hat, the stone which was on the road makes him fall down

unit.utterance: bad se tā az bačehaye digar ham kenāraš budand miāyand komakaš mikonand golābihā rā jam mikonand
unit.utterance_translation: there were also three other boys there, they come to help him gather up the pears

unit.utterance: bad az inke golābihā rā jam kardand bad jodā mišavand
unit.utterance_translation: having collected the pears, they left

unit.utterance: bad se tā bače dārand barmigardand mifahmand kolāh ruye zamin ast
unit.utterance_translation: while the boys are leaving, they noticed a hat on the ground

unit.utterance: mibarand kolāh rā beheš midahand va dar avaz ham pesar be ānhā se tā golābi midahad
unit.utterance_translation: they take it and give it back to him and in return the boy gave them three pears

unit.utterance: barmigardand mard ke az bālāye deraxt miāyad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: they came back, the man climbs down the tree

unit.utterance: motevajeh mišavad ke yeki az sabadhā kam ast
unit.utterance_translation: and find out that one of the baskets is not there

unit.utterance: bad mibinad se pesar dārand miravand dastešān har kodām yek golābi ast kami šak kard
unit.utterance_translation: then he sees three boys passing while every one of them has a pear in his hand and he suspects them.
